level.heading: NOTICE TO INITIAL PUBLIC HOUSING AUTHORITY OF BILLING OR ABSORPTION (ยง 14-5509)

level.text: 5509.1 DCHA shall send Part II of HUD Form-52665 to the Initial PHA notifyinghe Initial PHA of absorption or billing arrangements.
5509.2 Under no circumstances shall DCHA absorb families into its programetroactively.
